data.title: Christian Berkel Discussion - News, Rumors, Gossip
data.meta_description: Christian Berkel: Christian Berkel. Actor: The Man from U.N.C.L.E.. Christian Berkel was born on 28 October 1957 in West Berlin, West Germany. He is an actor, known for The Man from U.N.C.L.E. (2015), Valkyrie (2008) and Trumbo (2015). He has been married to Andrea Sawatzki since 17 December 2011. They have two children.
